Penlight.name: Penlight
Penlight.description: The penlight you get on the first run of the game.

Penlight.name: Marble Penlight
Penlight.description: A bead-shaped penlight that gives off a bright glow.

Penlight.name: Star Guardian Penlight
Penlight.description: A magic wand-shaped penlight that gives off a starlight.

Penlight.name: Link Penlight
Penlight.description: A penlight in which three rings combine to give a beautiful light.

Penlight.name: Brightening Fish
Penlight.description: A few brightening fish that don't exist in the world.
